Class MaxHeap<E extends MaxHeapNode>

  • java.lang.Object
    • MaxHeap<E>
  • Type Parameters:
    E - Any type which implements MaxHeapNode interface

    public class MaxHeap<E extends MaxHeapNode>
extends java.lang.Object
    Max Heap class which holds its elements in an array list and organises those elements according to the amount information in the nodes. The greater a nodes amount value is, the closer it is to the root.
    Author:
    Berke Belgin 171044065
    See Also:
    MaxHeapNode, ArrayList

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean add(E item)
      Inserts a node with that age to the appropriate position if not exist already or increments its amount then reorganises the heap.
      E find(E target)
      Find method
      int olderThan(int age)
      Method that returns the amount of people in the three whose age is older than given age.
      boolean remove(E target)
      Removes a node with the same age as targets age if its amount is one or decrements its amount then reorganises the heap.
      java.lang.String toString() 
      int youngerThan(int age)
      Method that returns the amount of people in the three whose age is younger than given age.
